AcknowledgementÂ¶

This package is motivated by the precursor PyXel. The aim of this package is to provide a lightweight, Python based, and extensible tool for daily X-ray imaging analysis. The author thanks Aurora Simionescu for introducing PyXel; thanks Jelle de Plaa for guidance on software packaging and documentation.
